original_text: In the eleventh month of the twelfth year, on the first day of the month, the word of the Lord came to me:
korean_text: 열한째 해 어느 달 초하루에 여호와의 말씀이 내게 임하여 이르시되

sentences.original_text: In the eleventh month of the twelfth year
on the first day of the month
the word of the Lord came to me
